data.title: The Other Kind of Smart
data.text:
Mental Health News Radio / January 2017

http://www.blogtalkradio.com/mentalhealthnews/2017/01/24/the-other-kind-of-smartemotional-intelligence-with-harvey-deutschendorf

"Harvey Deutschendorf is "the best kind of smart", not The Other Kind of Smart as his book suggests.

What an inspirational interview MHNR Network had with Harvey. Harvey's knowledge about Emotional Intelligence surpasses what most experts are able to articulate. Why? Because Harvey himself has built his own EI over the years and understands the importance EI has in ones' life. His success is a direct result of his hard work in understanding his own Emotional Intelligence. Listen as he and host of MHNR, Kristin Walker, discuss his journey and delve deeper into exactly what EI is in the first place."
